records.name: JobId
records.description: A read-only record consisting of a unique identifier for a created job.

fields.name: errorPolicy
fields.description: The policy to follow when there is an error in Job execution

fields.name: waitingPolicy
fields.description:
The policy to follow when the next task is triggering while the previous job is still
being processing

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Executes by the Scheduler when the scheduled trigger fires.

objectTypes.name: Job
objectTypes.description: The Ballerina Job object provides the abstraction for a job instance, which schedules to execute periodically.

parameters.name: workerCount
parameters.description:
Specifies the number of workers that are available for the concurrent execution of jobs.
It should be a positive integer. The recommendation is to set a value less than 10. Default sets to 5.

parameters.name: waitingTime
parameters.description:
The number of seconds as a decimal the scheduler will tolerate a trigger to pass its next-fire-time
before being considered as `ignored the trigger`.

returnParameters.description: A `task:Error` if the process failed due to any reason or else ()

functions.name: configureWorkerPool
functions.description:
Configure the scheduler worker pool.
```ballerina
check task:configureWorkerPool(4, 7);
```

returnParameters.description: Returns the IDs of all the running jobs as an array

functions.name: getRunningJobs
functions.description:
Gets all the running jobs.
```ballerina
task:JobId[] result = task:getRunningJobs();
```

returnParameters.description: Time in milliseconds or else `task:Error` if the process failed due to any reason

functions.name: getTimeInMillies
functions.description: Gets time in milliseconds of the given `time:Civil`.

returnParameters.description: A `task:Error` if an error occurred while pausing or else ()

functions.name: pauseAllJobs
functions.description:
Pauses all the jobs.
```ballerina
check task:pauseAllJobs();
```

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The ID of the job as a `task:JobId`, which needs to be paused

returnParameters.description: A `task:Error` if an error occurred while pausing a job or else ()

functions.name: pauseJob
functions.description:
Pauses the particular job.
```ballerina
check task:pauseJob(jobId);
```

returnParameters.description: A `task:Error` when an error occurred while resuming or else ()

functions.name: resumeAllJobs
functions.description:
Resumes all the jobs.
```ballerina
check task:resumeAllJobs();
```

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The ID of the job as a `task:JobId`, which needs to be resumed

returnParameters.description: A `task:Error` when an error occurred while resuming a job or else ()

functions.name: resumeJob
functions.description:
Resumes the particular job.
```ballerina
check task:resumeJob(jobId);
```

parameters.name: job
parameters.description: Ballerina job, which is to be executed by the scheduler.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The duration of the trigger (in seconds), which is used to run the job frequently

parameters.name: maxCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of trigger counts

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description:
The trigger start time in Ballerina `time:Civil`. If it is not provided, a trigger will
start immediately

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The trigger end time in Ballerina `time:Civil`

parameters.name: taskPolicy
parameters.description: The policy, which is used to handle the error and will be waiting during the trigger time

returnParameters.description: A `task:JobId` or else a `task:Error` if the process failed due to any reason

functions.name: scheduleJobRecurByFrequency
functions.description:
Schedule the recurring `task:Job` according to the given duration. Once scheduled, it will return the job ID, which
can be used to manage the job.
```ballerina
task:JobId jobId = check task:scheduleJobRecurByFrequency(new Job(), 3);
```

parameters.name: job
parameters.description: Ballerina job, which is to be executed during the trigger.

parameters.name: triggerTime
parameters.description: The specific time in Ballerina `time:Civil` to trigger only one time

returnParameters.description: A `task:JobId` or else a `task:Error` if the process failed due to any reason

functions.name: scheduleOneTimeJob

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The ID of the job as a `task:JobId`, which needs to be unscheduled

returnParameters.description: A `task:Error` if the process failed due to any reason or else ()

functions.name: unscheduleJob
functions.description:
Unschedule the `task:Job`, which is associated with the given job ID. If no job is running in the scheduler,
the scheduler will be shut down automatically.
```ballerina
check task:unscheduleJob(jobId);
```

errors.name: Error
errors.description:
Represents the error type of the `ballerina/task` module. This error type represents any error that can occur during
the execution of the task APIs.

modules.summary: This module provides APIs to schedule a Ballerina job either once or periodically and to manage the execution of those jobs.
